mng: to not be, not, wrong, incorrect, non-, un-, in-, to reproach or blame, (colloquial) to insist on, simply must
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa

exm.mng: only if (..., or otherwise, ...), only when, only in the case that, unless
nothing remains the same (idiom); change beyond recognition
lit. not to know whether to laugh or cry (idiom), between laughter and tears
